books.title: Atomic Habits
books.description: No matter your goals, Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for improving--every day. James Clear, one of the world's leading experts on habit formation, reveals practical strategies that will teach you exactly how to form good habits

books.title: The power of your subconscious
books.description: Includes never-before-published commentary from the author The Power of Your Subconscious Mind introduces and explains the mind-focusing techniques that remove the subconscious obstacles

books.title: Ego is the enemy the fight
books.description: It's wrecked the careers of promising young geniuses. It's evaporated great fortunes and run companies into the ground. It's made adversity unbearable and turned struggle into shame

books.title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
books.description: It's evaporated great fortunes and run companies into the ground. It's made adversity unbearable and turned struggle into shame

books.title: Sparks of Phoenix
books.description: As the phoenix emerges from its ashes, Zebian emerges ablaze in these pages, not only as a survivor of abuse, but as a teacher and healer for all those who have struggled to understand, reclaim, and rise above a history of pain.

books.title: Cuisine pour diabétiques
books.description: Les carottes sont donc loin d'être interdites dans un régime de diabète de type 2. De fait, elles ne contiennent que 5% de glucides et ont leur place dans l'alimentation adaptée au diabète de type 2
